reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major infratentorial brain tumor types: cerebellar astrocytomas (~2.5 per 100k), medulloblastomas (~0.8 per 100k), brainstem gliomas (~1.2 per 100k), ependymomas (~0.6 per 100k), other infratentorial tumors (~2.1 per 100k) = ~7.2 per 100k. Umbrella term with significant heterogeneity between age groups (higher in pediatric populations) and regions. Low confidence due to aggregate estimation and clinical heterogeneity.
source: GLOBOCAN 2005 brain tumor data aggregated by anatomical location; pediatric oncology registries
